WorkItem.Description: The DataGridComboBoxColumn class does not expose the ComboBox.IsEditable property as a property of its own.  Although a template column could be used instead, this feature would still be nice to have.

Comments.Message: You have DataGridComboBoxColumn.EditingElementStyle which you can set the IsEditable property.

Thanks for the tip.

FYI, I needed IsEditable to solve this problem: 

http://www.codeplex.com/wpf/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=39047

Hi davedev,

We've recorded the request for exposing IsEditable on DataGridComboBox column to our database of feature requests and will consider adding this in a future release.

Thanks,
Samantha
